<head>
      
    	
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
    
	
	
	
	
	
      
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
  
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
  
    
    
      
      
      
    
    
      
      
      
    
    
      
    
  
    
    
      
      
      
      
      
      
      
    
  
    
    
    
  
    
	
	
	
	
	
    
	
	
      
Tentang : 


body{
    margin:0;padding:0!important;width:100%;font-family:'Nunito Sans',sans-serif;font-size:14px;color:#48525c;background-color:#fafafc;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-webkit-transition:all .1s ease;transition:all .1s ease;        
}
.bg{
background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-khOGIwGfOMI/X-HNu1KFwiI/AAAAAAAADiQ/j1iYB5m9mLMgEjLdG9uRFvPBgVu5YkAPQCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/a0e8a2acd6d7d8fe82c81c20efe454d2.jpg);background-size:cover;width:100%;height:35%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;
}
.cover-bg{
background:white;width:90%;position:relative;min-height:175px;padding-bottom:60px;top:130px;border-radius:20px;left:0;margin:0 auto;box-shadow:0 10px 50px 0 rgb(30 30 30 / 4%)}
.cc-bg{
background:#ffffff;width:110px;height:110px;position:absolute;top:75px;border-radius:50%;left:50%;z-index:99;margin-left:-55px}
.cbb{
background:white;width:90%;position:relative;min-height:130px;padding-bottom:60px;top:130px;border-radius:20px;left:0;margin:0 auto;box-shadow:0 10px 50px 0 rgb(30 30 30 / 4%);
}
.cc-pp{
    width:100px;height:100px;position:absolute;top:3.5%;border-radius:50%;left:50%;z-index:999;margin-left:-50px;background-size:cover}
.separate{
    display:block;top:45px;position:relative;
}
.separate:before{
	content:'\2027 \2027 \2027';display:block;color:#505050;text-align:center;font-size:38px;font-style:normal;letter-spacing:0.3em;text-indent:0.3em;clear:both}
.nama{
	top:65px;position:relative;font-size:18px;font-family:'Righteous',cursive;text-align:center;
}
.desc{
font-size:12.5px;position:relative;color:#505050;margin:0 20px 0 20px;font-family:'Righteous',cursive;top:35px;font-weight:400;letter-spacing:3px;
}
.frame{
	display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around;align-items:center;height:36px;width:94%;margin:0 auto;bottom:-55px;position:relative;transition:box-shadow 0.6s cubic-bezier(.79,.21,.06,.81);border-radius:10px;
}
.btn{
    height:40px;width:40px;border-radius:20px;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-khOGIwGfOMI/X-HNu1KFwiI/AAAAAAAADiQ/j1iYB5m9mLMgEjLdG9uRFvPBgVu5YkAPQCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/a0e8a2a….jpg);background-size:cover;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;
}
.btn1{
    height:0;width:100px;border-radius:20px;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-khOGIwGfOMI/X-HNu1KFwiI/AAAAAAAADiQ/j1iYB5m9mLMgEjLdG9uRFvPBgVu5YkAPQCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/a0e8a2a….jpg);background-size:cover;display:flex;font-family:'Righteous',cursive;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;padding:20px 0 20px 0;text-align:center;color:white;font-size:11px;bottom:35px;left:35px}
.lainnya{
font-size:13px;color:#191919;position:absolute;top:20px;left:20px;font-family:'Righteous',cursive}
.framee{
width:95%;top:60px;flex-wrap:nowrap;justify-content:flex-start;display:flex;position:relative;align-content:flex-start;margin:30px 0;border-radius:15px;overflow-x:auto;overflow-y:hidden}
.gbr{
height:100px;display:block;width:100px;flex:0 0 auto;border-radius:15px;position:relative;margin:0 10px 0 10px;left:5px;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-0KR9BuVS51Y/X-IUqseG_jI/AAAAAAAADic/8AhZHuH2NWILGg9LQK__iIqJSBodG9JJQCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/gt.jpg);background-size:cover}
.gbr1{
height:100px;display:block;width:100px;flex:0 0 auto;border-radius:15px;position:relative;margin:0 10px 0 10px;left:5px;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lSmcZfJEPUg/X-IUq_Z-U1I/AAAAAAAADik/XRu6KYUZeqoB0jV65KRIRJJoE-OBURu6QCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/filter.jpg);background-size:cover}
.gbr2{
height:100px;display:block;width:100px;flex:0 0 auto;border-radius:15px;position:relative;margin:0 10px 0 10px;left:5px;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HNvWKHiQTJ8/X-IUq9tn8RI/AAAAAAAADig/Gr0-P0rEqr4z8-29uztNONgBs6gsU_c0QCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/tianid.jpg);background-size:cover}
.kosong{
    background:#ffffff00;width:90%;position:relative;min-height:5%;padding-bottom:60px;top:140px;border-radius:5%;left:0;margin:0 auto}
.cv{
    position:fixed;font-family:'Righteous',cursive;bottom:0;left:0;color:#eee;background:url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-khOGIwGfOMI/X-HNu1KFwiI/AAAAAAAADiQ/j1iYB5m9mLMgEjLdG9uRFvPBgVu5YkAPQCLcBGAsYHQ/s0/a0e8a2a….jpg);font-size:20px;width:100%;background-size:cover;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;box-shadow:0 10px 50px 0 rgb(30 30 30 / 4%);height:55px;border-radius:40px 40px 0 0}
                  
                  
  
  <!--
--></head>
    
    

 

       
 
 

   
   	

   	

   	
Umur 19 Tahun, sangat antusias dengan segala hal yang berbau editing photo/video
   	

      	Kunjungi Blog
